meanings.sent1: After forgetting to send the first invitation, she reinvited her friend to the party.
meanings.sent2: She reinvited her classmates to the study group after they missed the first session.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally reinvited his neighbor to the barbecue, making it a double celebration.
meanings.sent4: The garden reinvited the butterflies with its blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: The warm smile on her face reinvited him to join the conversation.

meanings.sent1: The reinvited guests arrived with excitement for the event.
meanings.sent2: She felt honored to be one of the reinvited attendees to the exclusive gala.
meanings.sent3: The reinvited visitors brought extra gifts to make up for missing the first party.
meanings.sent4: The reinvited students were eager to catch up on the lessons they had missed.
meanings.sent5: The reinvited customers received special discounts as a token of appreciation.
